stepresult.p: If you have previously customized your configuration files, apt returns a warning, and installs the new configuration files with a different name. This preserves your customizations. Before you continue, customize and rename the new configuration files.
stepresult.note: For larger deployments, use a script to upgrade the component host machines. For example: for host in 28 29 32 33 35 39 40; do echo 192.168.51.$host; ssh 192.168.51.$host 'apt-get dist-upgrade -y $( rpm -qa | grep euca )' ; done
